Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: filter(fcpxElements:ofTypes:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Returns an array of elements that match specified FCPXML element types.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: CMTimeFrom(timecodeHours:timecodeMinutes:timecodeSeconds:timecodeFrames:frameDuration:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a CMTime value that represents real time from timecode values.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: CMTime(fromFCPXMLTime:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts an FCPXML time value to a CMTime value.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: fcpxmlTime(fromCMTime:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts a CMTime value to an FCPXML time value.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: conform(time:toFrameDuration:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Conforms a given CMTime value to the frameDuration so that the value falls on an edit frame boundary. The function rounds the edit frame down.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: projectTimecode(fromCounterValue:inProject:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts a project counter value to the project’s timecode.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: projectCounterTime(fromTimecodeValue:inProject:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts a project timecode value to the project’s counter time.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: parentTime(fromLocalTime:forClip:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts a local time value to a clip’s parent time value. In FCPXML, this would be converting a time value that is in the start value timescale to the offset value timescale.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: localTime(fromParentTime:forClip:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts a parent time value to a clip’s local time value. In FCPXML, this would be converting a time value that is in the offset value timescale to the start value timescale.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: projectTime(forClip:inProject:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Provides the start time of the given clip within the project timeline.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: convertLineBreaksInAttributes(inXMLDocumentURL:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Converts line breaks in attributes to safe XML entities in an XML file, returning an NSXMLDocument.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.name: FFVideoFormat(fromWidth:height:frameRate:isInterlaced:isSD16x9:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:FV8Pipelin.abstract: Returns the FFVideoFormat identifier based on the given parameters. If the parameters don’t match a defined identifier according to FCPXML v1.5, the method will return the string FFVideoFormatRateUndefined.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxmlString
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The FCPXML document as a properly formatted string.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxResourceList
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of all resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxLibrary
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The library XMLElement in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxEvents
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of all event elements in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxFormatResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of format resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxAssetResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of asset resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxMulticamResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of multicam resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxCompoundResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of compound clip resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxEffectResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of effect resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxAllProjects
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of all projects in all events in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxAllClips
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of all clips in all events in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxRoles
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: An array of all roles used in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxLastResourceID
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The highest resource ID number used in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxLastTextStyleID
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The highest text style ID number used in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxmlVersion
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxEventNames
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The names of all events as a String array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxAllEventItems
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: All items from all events as a XMLElement array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxAllEventItemNames
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The names of all items from all events as a XMLElement array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.name: fcpxAllProjectNames
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:vE8Pipeli.abstract: The names of all projects from all events as a XMLElement array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: init(contentsOfFCPXML:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Initializes a new XMLDocument using the contents of an existing FCPXML file.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: parseFCPXIDsAndRoles()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Parses the resource IDs, text style IDs, and roles, refreshing the fcpxLastResourceID, fcpxLastTextStyleID, and fcpxRoles properties. Call this method when initially loading an FCPXML document and when the IDs or roles change.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: resource(matchingID:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Returns the resource that matches the given ID string.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: assetResources(matchingURL:usingFilenameOnly:omittingExtension:caseSensitive:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Returns asset resources that match the given URL.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: add(resourceElement:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Adds a resource XMLElement to the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: add(resourceElements:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Adds an array of resource XMLElements to the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: remove(resourceAtIndex:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Removes the resource at the specified index.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: removeAllResources()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Removes all resources from the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: add(event:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Adds an event to the library XMLElement of the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: add(events:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Adds an array of event XMLElements to the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: remove(eventAtIndex:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Removes the event at the specified index.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: fcpxmlDTDVersions()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Returns the version numbers of the DTD documents included in this framework bundle.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: validateFCPXMLAgainstLatestVersion()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Validates the XMLDocument against the DTD of the latest FCPXML version included in this framework. The XMLDocument is valid if no error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.name: validateFCPXMLAgainst(version:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:FE8Pipeli.abstract: Validates the XMLDocument against the DTD of the FCPXML version specified. The version number must match a DTD resource included in the bundle. The XMLDocument is valid if no error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: fcpxEvent(name:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a new event FCPXML XMLElement object.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: fcpxEvent(name:items:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a new event FCPXML XMLElement object and adds items to it.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: fcpxProject(name:formatRef:duration:tcStart:tcFormat:audioLayout:audioRate:renderColorSpace:clips:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a new project FCPXML XMLElement object and adds clips to it.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: fcpxCompoundClip(name:ref:offset:duration:start:useAudioSubroles:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a new ref-clip FCPXML XMLElement object

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: fcpxGap(offset:duration:start:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a new gap to be used in a timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: fcpxTitle(titleName:lane:offset:ref:duration:start:role:titleText:textStyleID:newTextStyle:font:fontSize:fontFace:fontColor:strokeColor:strokeWidth:shadowColor:shadowDistance:shadowAngle:shadowBlurRadius:alignment:xPosition:yPosition:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Creates a new title to be used in a timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: isFCPXEventItem
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: True if this XMLElement is an item in an event, not a resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: isFCPXResource
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: True if this XMLElement is a resource, not an event item.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: fcpxParentEvent
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: If this is an event item, the event that contains it. Returns nil if it is not an event item.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: fcpxResource
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: If this is an event item, the XMLElement of its corresponding resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: fcpxAnnotations
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: An array of the annotation XMLElements within this event item or resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: referencingClips(inEvent:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns clips from an event that match this resource. If this method is called on an XMLElement that is not a resource, nil will be returned. If there are no matching clips in the event, an empty array will be returned.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: eventItems
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns all items contained within this event. If this is not an event, the property will be nil. If the event is empty, the property will be an empty array.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: eventProjects
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns the projects contained within this event. If this is not an event, the property will be nil. If the event has no projects, the property will be an empty array.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.name: eventClips
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:vE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns the clips contained within this event, excluding the projects. If this is not an event, the property will be nil. If the event has no clips, the property will be an empty array.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: eventClips(forResourceID:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns all clips in an event that match the given resource ID. If this method is called on an XMLElement that is not an event, nil will be returned. If there are no clips that match the resourceID, an empty array will be returned.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: addToEvent(item:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Adds an item to this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: addToEvent(items:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Adds multiple items to this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: removeFromEvent(itemIndex:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Removes an item from this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: removeFromEvent(itemIndexes:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Removes a group of items from this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: removeFromEvent(items:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Removes a group of items from this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: addToClip(annotationElements:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Adds an annotation XMLElement to this item, maintaining the proper order of the DTD. Conforms to FCPXML DTD v1.6.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: formatValues()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns an element’s associated format name, ID, frame duration, and frame size.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: urls()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Retrieves the URLs from the elements contained within this resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: allReferenceIDs()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Searches the given element and its sub-elements for references and returns them.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: clips(forName:inElement:usingAbsoluteMatch:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: A recursive function that goes through an element and all its children, finding clips that match the given name.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: clips(forElementType:inElement:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: A recursive function that goes through an element and all its children, finding clips that match the given type.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: clipRangeIncludes(_:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: clipRangeIsEnclosedBetween(_:outPoint:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: clipRangeOverlapsWith(_:outPoint:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns whether the clip overlaps with a given time range specified by an in and out point.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.name: childElementsWithinRangeOf(_:outPoint:elementType:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:FE8Pipelin.abstract: Returns child elements that fall within the specified in and out points. The element type can optionally be specified.

Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html#/s:FO8Pipel.name: none
Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html#/s:FO8Pipel.abstract: This element is not from an FCPXML document.

Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html.name: FCPXMLElementType
Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html.abstract: Defines the element types that can exist in FCPXML documents.

Enums.html.name: Enums
Enums.html.abstract: The following enums are available globally.

Extensions.html.name: Extensions
Extensions.html.abstract: The following extensions are available globally.

Structs.html.name: Structs
Structs.html.abstract: The following structs are available globally.
